statements: SELECT * FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule WHERE course_name = 'Math';
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE class_timings CONTAINS '10:00 AM';
SELECT * FROM course_schedule ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule WHERE id > 3;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT DISTINCT instructor_name FROM course_schedule ORDER BY instructor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, class_timing FROM course_schedule JOIN class_timing ON course_schedule.course_id = class_timing.timing_id;
SELECT * FROM class_timing WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT course_name FROM course_schedule ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, class_timing FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe' AND class_timing BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT course_name, class_timing, instructor_name FROM course_schedule WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%' ORDER BY class_timing;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule JOIN class_timing ON course_schedule.course_id = class_timing.timing_id WHERE class_timing.day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT COUNT(course_id) AS total_courses, instructor_name FROM course_schedule GROUP BY instructor_name HAVING total_hours > 10;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_id, course_name, start_date, end_date, class_timing FROM course_schedule;
SELECT class_id, class_name, instructor_name, room_number, course_id FROM class;
SELECT student_name, email FROM student;
SELECT student_id, student_name, email, class_id FROM student;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM course_schedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, student_name, email, class_id FROM student WHERE class_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, room_number FROM class WHERE class_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date, class_timing FROM course_schedule JOIN class ON course_schedule.course_id = class.course_id WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT course_name, department FROM courses;
SELECT schedule_id, course_id, day_of_week FROM class_schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, email FROM instructors WHERE department='Computer Science';
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE department='Mathematics';
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment ORDER BY enrollment_date;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE department = 'Computer Science';
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT instructor_name, department FROM instructors WHERE department = 'Mathematics' ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' AND start_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT course_name, student_id, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment WHERE course_id = 3 ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor FROM course_schedule ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM enrollment WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM student WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT room_id, room_name, building FROM classroom WHERE capacity >= 30 ORDER BY room_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor, start_date FROM course_schedule ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, email, phone_number FROM student WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT course_name, location, start_time, end_time FROM course_schedule JOIN class_timings ON course_schedule.course_id = class_timings.course_id WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT room_name, capacity, building FROM classroom WHERE capacity >= 30 ORDER BY room_name ASC;
